function genCodeStr(){
var codeRE = new RegExp(â€œâ€˜(.*)â€™ : â€˜(.*)â€™â€,â€giâ€);
var tempStr,codeStr = â€œâ€;
var myReader = new Reader();
myReader.loadFile(â€˜inc/gb2312_utf.txtâ€™);//è¿™é‡Œæ”¹æˆä½ çš„å¯¹ç…§è¡¨å­˜æ”¾çš„è·¯å¾„
while(!myReader.fStream.atEndofLine) {
tempStr = new String(myReader.fStream.readLine());
codeStr += tempStr.replace(codeRE,â€$1â€) + â€œ:â€ + tempStr.replace(codeRE,â€$2â€) + â€œ:â€;
}
Application(â€œcodeDataâ€) = codeStr;
}
function getCodeStr(){
var codeStr = new String(Application(â€œcodeDataâ€));
if(codeStr.indexOf(â€œ%a1%a1â€) == -1){
genCodeStr();
}
return new String(Application(â€œcodeDataâ€));
}
function gb2utf(gbStr){
var codeStr = getCodeStr();
var codeRE = new RegExp(â€œ(%..%..)â€,â€giâ€);
var replaceRE = new RegExp(â€œ(%..%..)â€,â€iâ€);
var gbCode;
var utfCode;
var gbStart;
while((codeRE.lastIndex < gbStr.length) && replaceRE.test(gbStr)){
codeRE.exec(gbStr);
gbCode = new String(RegExp.$1);
gbStart = new Number(codeStr.indexOf(gbCode.toLowerCase()));
var utfStart = 0;
if(gbStart != -1){
utfStart= gbStart + 7;
utfCode = codeStr.substring(utfStart,utfStart + 6);
}else{
utfCode = â€œ%u3000â€;
}
gbStr = gbStr.replace(replaceRE,utfCode);
}
return gbStr;
}

function Reader() { //Class Reader()
this.fso; //Private fso
this.fUri; //Private fUri
this.fStream; //Private fStream
try{
this.fso = new ActiveXObject(â€œScripting.FileSystemObjectâ€);
}catch(exception) {
throw exception;
}
this.loadFile = function(file) { //Public loadFile(file)
this.fUri = Server.mappath(file);
//var fStream = fso.CreateTextFile(tfolder,true,false);
//fStream.WriteLine(â€˜testâ€™);
if(this.fso.fileExists(this.fUri)){
this.fStream = this.fso.openTextFile(this.fUri);
}else{
Response.write(â€˜file dos not existâ€™);
}
}
this.readLineN = function(num) {
var i = 1;
while(i < num && !this.fStream.atEndOfLine) {
this.fStream.skipLine();
i++
}
return this.fStream.readLine();
}
this.closeFile = function() {
fStream.Close();
fso.Close;
}
}

entry.title: å…³äºAuthyå°´å°¬-CarlZeng
entry.content:
Export TOTP tokens from Authy

èƒŒæ™¯

2021å¹´ï¼Œè‡³å°‘æ˜¯2022å¹´çš„å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†æ—¶é—´ï¼ŒAuthy Desktopè¿˜æ˜¯éå¸¸å¥½ç”¨çš„ã€‚å¯æ˜¯ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

æ­¥éª¤å·²ç»å†™å¾—éå¸¸æ¸…æ™°æ˜äº†ï¼Œä¸ªäººæµ‹è¯•éå¸¸é¡ºåˆ©ï¼Œç»™åŠ›æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š

  1. InstallÂ Authy desktop appÂ - The following steps will work on Linux, Mac and Windows.
  2. Open Authy and log in, so you can see the codes being generated for you Note: Authy has a backup password feature that is enabled on some accounts; I think itâ€™s ones that have a padlock icon next to them. For those accounts, you might need to enter the backup password to be able to export them.
  3. Restart Authy desktop app, but add theÂ --remote-debugging-port=5858Â parameter to the command-line:
      • On Windows: right-click the Authy desktop shortcut, and in the Target field writeÂ --remote-debugging-port=5858Â at the end. Then click OK. Double-click the Authy desktop shortcut.
      • On Mac: from Terminal.app:Â open -a "Authy Desktop" --args --remote-debugging-port=5858
      • On Linux, from a terminal:Â authy --remote-debugging-port=5858
  1. Open the following URL in a Chrome (or Chromium-bases) web browser:Â http://localhost:5858
  2. Click theÂ Twilio AuthyÂ link in that webpage.
  3. In Chrome Developer Tools top navigation bar, go in theÂ SourcesÂ tab (if you donâ€™t see it, clickÂ >>Â to expand the full list), then select theÂ SnippetsÂ sub-tab (tabs on the second line; again, clickÂ >>Â to expand the full list), and finally chooseÂ + New snippet.
  4. If youâ€™d like to ensure the code below doesnâ€™t send anything to a remote server, you can disconnect from the internet now.
  5. In the snippet editor window that appears on the right, paste the following code:

// Based on https://github.com/LinusU/base32-encode/blob/master/index.js
function hex_to_b32(hex) { let alphabet = â€œABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ234567â€; let bytes = []; for (let i = 0; i < hex.length; i += 2) { bytes.push(parseInt(hex.substr(i, 2), 16)); } let bits = 0; let value = 0; let output = â€˜â€™; for (let i = 0; i < bytes.length; i++) { value = (value << 8) | bytes[i]; bits += 8; while (bits >= 5) { output += alphabet[(value >>> (bits - 5)) & 31]; bits -= 5; } } if (bits > 0) { output += alphabet[(value << (5 - bits)) & 31]; } return output; }

// Based on https://github.com/adriancooney/console.image
function console_image(url, size) { console.log(â€œ%c+â€, â€œfont-size: 1px; padding: â€œ + Math.floor(size / 2) + â€œpx â€œ + Math.floor(size / 2) + â€œpx; line-height: â€œ + size + â€œpx; background: url(â€œ + url + â€œ); color: transparent;â€); }

(function(console) { console.save = function(data, filename) { if (!data) { console.error(â€˜Console.save: No dataâ€™); return; } if (typeof data === â€œobjectâ€) { data = JSON.stringify(data, undefined, 4) } var blob = new Blob([data], {type: â€˜text/jsonâ€™}), e = document.createEvent(â€˜MouseEventsâ€™), a = document.createElement(â€˜aâ€™); a.download = filename; a.href = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); a.dataset.downloadurl = [â€˜text/jsonâ€™, a.download, a.href].join(â€˜:â€™); e.initMouseEvent(â€˜clickâ€™, true, false, window, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, false, false, false, 0, null); a.dispatchEvent(e); } })(console);

console.clear();
console.warn(â€œHereâ€™s your Authy tokens:â€);
var data = appManager.getModel().map(function(i) {
var secretSeed = i.secretSeed;
if (typeof secretSeed == â€˜undefinedâ€™) {
secretSeed = i.encryptedSeed;
}
var secret = (i.markedForDeletion === false ? i.decryptedSeed : hex_to_b32(secretSeed));
var period = (i.digits === 7 ? 10 : 30);
var totp_uri = `otpauth://totp/${encodeURIComponent(i.name)}?secret=${secret}&digits=${i.digits}&period=${period}`;
var qr_size = 250;
var qr_url = (new QRious({value: totp_uri, size: qr_size})).toDataURL();
console.group(i.name);
console.log(â€˜TOTP secret:â€™, secret);
console.log(â€˜TOTP URI:â€™, totp_uri);
console_image(qr_url, qr_size);
console.groupEnd();
return {name: i.name, secret: secret, uri: totp_uri};
});
//console.save(data, â€˜authy_backup.jsonâ€™);

  1. Right-click the snippet name on the navigator pane on the left (eg.Â Script snippet #1) , and chooseÂ Run.
  2. All your Authy tokens will be displayed in the Console at the bottom; either copy-paste the TOTP URI, or scan the QR codes.

Alternatively, this code can be used to save your tokens as a JSON file, for example to import into Bitwarden:

function saveToFile(data, filename) { if (!data) { console.error(â€˜Console.save: No dataâ€™); return; } if (typeof data === â€œobjectâ€) { data = JSON.stringify(data, undefined, 4) } const blob = new Blob([data], { type: â€˜text/jsonâ€™ }); const e = document.createEvent(â€˜MouseEventsâ€™); const a = document.createElement(â€˜aâ€™); a.download = filename; a.href = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); a.dataset.downloadurl = [â€˜text/jsonâ€™, a.download, a.href].join(â€˜:â€™); e.initMouseEvent(â€˜clickâ€™, true, false, window, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, false, false, false, 0, null); a.dispatchEvent(e); } function deEncrypt({ log = false, save = false }) {

      const totp \= \`otpauth://totp/${name}?secret=${secret}&digits=${i.digits}&period=${period}${issuer ? '&issuer=' + issuer : ''}\`;

      return ({
          id: uuidv4(),
          organizationId: null,
          folderId: folder.id,
          type: 1,
          reprompt: 0,
          name,
          notes: null,
          favorite: false,
          login: {
              username: null,
              password: null,
              totp
          },
          collectionIds: null });
  }),

}; if (log) console.log(JSON.stringify(bw)); if (save) saveToFile(bw, â€˜authy-to-bitwarden-export.jsonâ€™);
}

deEncrypt({
log: true,
save: true,
});

function hideAlertBox(elemId)

function getAlertBoxHtml(sTitle, sMessage, iType, width, helpUrl, helpText)
{
if (iType != NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOWEST_PRIORITY &&
iType != NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOW_PRIORITY &&
iType != NLAlertDialog.TYPE_MEDIUM_PRIORITY &&
iType != NLAlertDialog.TYPE_HIGH_PRIORITY)
iType = NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOW_PRIORITY;
if(!width)
width = 600;
if (!sTitle)
{
switch (iType)
{
case NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOWEST_PRIORITY:
sTitle = â€œConfirmationâ€;
break;
case NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOW_PRIORITY:
sTitle = â€œInformationâ€;
break;
case NLAlertDialog.TYPE_MEDIUM_PRIORITY:
sTitle = â€œWARNINGâ€;
break;
case NLAlertDialog.TYPE_HIGH_PRIORITY:
default:
sTitle = â€œErrorâ€;
break;
}
}

var bHelpLink = false;

helpText = â€œVisit this Help Topicâ€;
}
return â€œ

NLAlertDialog = Class.create();

NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOWEST_PRIORITY = 0;
NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOW_PRIORITY = 1;
NLAlertDialog.TYPE_MEDIUM_PRIORITY = 2;
NLAlertDialog.TYPE_HIGH_PRIORITY = 3;

NLAlertDialog.prototype =
{
initialize: function(sId)
{
this.sId = sId || â€œNLAlertDialogâ€;
},

show: function(sTitle, sMessage, iType, sTargetDivId)
{
var posX = document.body.clientWidth / 2;
var posY = document.body.clientHeight / 2;

var sTitleId = this.sId + â€˜_titleâ€™;
var sMessageId = this.sId + â€˜_messageâ€™;

if(!iType) iType = NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOW_PRIORITY;

if (!this.hndDialogDiv)
{
this.hndDialogDiv = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
this.hndDialogDiv.innerHTML = getAlertBoxHtml(sTitle, sMessage, iType);
this.hndDialogDiv.style.display = â€œnoneâ€;
this.hndDialogDiv.style.position = â€œabsoluteâ€;
document.body.appendChild(this.hndDialogDiv);
}
if (sTargetDivId != null)
{
$(sTargetDivId).innerHTML = this.hndDialogDiv.innerHTML;
return;
}
if (this.hndDialogDiv.style.display == â€œblockâ€)
return;
this.hndDialogDiv.style.display = â€œblockâ€;
this.hndDialogDiv.style.top = posY - (this.hndDialogDiv.clientHeight / 2);
this.hndDialogDiv.style.left = posX - (this.hndDialogDiv.clientWidth / 2);
},

hide: function( sTargetDivId )
{
if (sTargetDivId != null)
$(sTargetDivId).innerHTML = â€œâ€;
else if (this.hndDialogDiv != null)
this.hndDialogDiv.style.display = â€œnoneâ€;
}
}

æ€è·¯ï¼š

On the Hekate home screen, tap emuMMC > Create emuMMC > SD Partition > Continue > OK.

On the next screen you will see 4 different coloured slider bars.

10). Drag the Red emuMMC (RAW) slider to the middle.

It should now say 29 FULL on the right hand side. This is the partition we are going to create.

11). Tap Next Step > Start on the Partition Manager screen.

12). Once Hekate finishes partitioning your microSD card, tap OK > Close.

13). Back on the Hekate home screen, tap emuMMC > Create emuMMC > SD Partition.

14). It should now say Found applicable partition(s)!. Tap Part 1.

Hekate will now build the emuMMC.

15). When it is finished you can press Close.

Under emuMMC Info & Selection you should now see a green tick and Enabled in green writing, this means the emuMMC was built successfully and it is now enabled.

The typeof operator returns type information as a string. There are six possible values that typeof returns: â€œnumber,â€ â€œstring,â€ â€œboolean,â€ â€œobject,â€ â€œfunction,â€ and â€œundefined.â€

if( typeof(ST) == â€˜stringâ€™ )

instanceof - æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªå®ä¾‹

The instanceof operator returns true if object is an instance of class. It returns false if object is not an instance of the specified class, or if object is null.

function objTest(obj){
var i, t, s = â€œâ€; // Create variables.
t = new Array(); // Create an array.
t[â€œDateâ€] = Date; // Populate the array.

t[â€œArrayâ€] = Array;
for (i in t)
{
if (obj instanceof t[i]) // Check class of obj.
{
s += â€œobj is an instance of â€œ + i + â€œ\nâ€;
}
else
{
s += â€œobj is not an instance of â€œ + i + â€œ\nâ€;
}
}
return(s); // Return string.
}

    Chrome extension that uses vulnerability CVE-2021-33044 to log in to Dahua IP cameras and VTH/VTO (video intercom) devices without authentication.

For other device types (NVR/DVR/XVR, etc), there exists CVE-2021-33045 which cannot be exploited with an ordinary web browser.

These vulnerabilities are likely to be fixed in firmware released after Sept 2021.

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// å…¬ç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯IE
function isIE() {
return document.all && window.external;
}

// å»é™¤å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸¤è¾¹çš„ç©ºæ ¼
String.prototype.trim = function() {
var re = /(^\s*)|(\s*)$/g;
return this.replace(re, â€œâ€);
}

// åˆ é™¤æ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
Array.prototype.remove = function(i) {
var o = this[i];
for (var j = i; j < this.length - 1; j ++) {
this[j] = this[j + 1];
}
-- this.length;
return o;
}

// åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ç›¸åŒçš„å…ƒç´ 
Array.prototype.search = function(o) {
for (var i = 0; i < this.length; i ++) {
if (this[i] == o) {
return i;
}
}

return -1;
}

// htmlç¼–ç 
function htmlEncode(s) {
s = s.replace(/&/g, â€œ&â€);
s = s.replace(/</g, â€œ<â€);
s = s.replace(/>/g, â€œ>â€);
s = s.replace(/\â€œ/g, â€œâ€â€);
s = s.replace(/\/g, â€œâ€â€);

return s;
}

// jsç¼–ç 
function jsEncode(s) {
s = s.replace(/\\/g, â€œ\\\\â€œ);
s = s.replace(/\n/g, â€œ\\nâ€);
s = s.replace(/\â€œ/g, â€œ\\\â€œâ€);
s = s.replace(/\/g, â€œ\\\â€œ);
return s;
}

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// å‘½ä»¤è¡Œçª—å£å·¥å…·
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
function Console(parentNode, processInputProc) {
// çª—å£
var panel = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
panel.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
panel.style.height = â€œ250pxâ€;
panel.style.borderColor = â€œ#666666â€;
panel.style.borderWidth = â€œ1pxâ€;
panel.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ffffffâ€;
panel.style.borderStyle = â€œsolidâ€;
panel.style.position = â€œabsoluteâ€;
panel.style.zIndex = 100;
parentNode.appendChild(panel);

// æ ‡é¢˜æ 
var title = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
title.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
title.style.height = â€œ15pxâ€;
title.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ddddddâ€;
title.style.fontSize = â€œ12pxâ€;
title.style.fontFamily = â€œverdana,tahomaâ€;
panel.appendChild(title);

// æ ‡é¢˜æ æ‹–åŠ¨çª—å£åŠŸèƒ½
var isDragging = false;
var startPos = new Position(panel.offsetLeft, panel.offsetTop);
var startMousePos = new Position(0, 0);

title.onmouseover = function(evt) {
this.style.cursor = â€œpointerâ€;
}

title.onmousedown = function(evt) {
if (isDragging == true) {
return;
}

var event = evt || window.event;
startMousePos.x = event.clientX;
startMousePos.y = event.clientY;
isDragging = true;
}

title.onmousemove = function(evt) {
if (isDragging == false) {
return;
}

activateWindow();
var event = evt || window.event;
panel.style.left = (event.clientX - startMousePos.x) + startPos.x + â€œpxâ€;
panel.style.top = (event.clientY - startMousePos.y) + startPos.y + â€œpxâ€;
}

title.onmouseup = function(evt) {
if (isDragging == false) {
return;
}

var event = evt || window.event;
startPos.x = (event.clientX - startMousePos.x) + startPos.x;
panel.style.left = startPos.x + â€œpxâ€;
startPos.y = (event.clientY - startMousePos.y) + startPos.y;
panel.style.top = startPos.y + â€œpxâ€;
isDragging = false;
}

// å…³é—­çª—å£åŠŸèƒ½
var closeButton = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
closeButton.style.width = â€œ13pxâ€;
closeButton.style.height = â€œ13pxâ€;
closeButton.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ffffffâ€;
closeButton.style.styleFloat = closeButton.style.cssFloat = â€œleftâ€;
closeButton.style.fontSize = â€œ12pxâ€;
closeButton.style.borderWidth = â€œ1pxâ€;
closeButton.style.borderColor = â€œ#999999â€;
closeButton.style.borderStyle = â€œsolidâ€;
closeButton.style.paddingButton = â€œ2pxâ€;
closeButton.innerHTML = â€œ<div style=\â€œmargin-top: -2px;margin-left: 3px;\â€œ>xâ€œ;
title.appendChild(closeButton);

var isVisible = true;

// çª—å£å…³é—­
closeButton.onclick = function(evt) {
isVisible = false;
panel.style.display = â€œnoneâ€;
}

// æ ‡é¢˜æ æ–‡å­—
var titleLabel = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
titleLabel.style.height = â€œ14pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.width = â€œ200pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.fontSize = â€œ11pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.color = â€œ#ffffffâ€;
titleLabel.style.styleFloat = titleLabel.style.cssFloat = â€œleftâ€;
titleLabel.style.fontFamily = â€œverdana,tahomaâ€;
titleLabel.innerHTML = â€œJavascript Inline Debuggerâ€;
//titleLabel.style.marginTop = isIE() ? -14 : â€œ-14pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.marginLeft = isIE() ? 18 : â€œ18pxâ€;
title.appendChild(titleLabel);

// ä¸­é—´çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºéƒ¨åˆ†
var showPanel = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
showPanel.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
showPanel.style.height = isIE() ? â€œ221pxâ€ : â€œ219pxâ€;
showPanel.style.fontSize = â€œ11pxâ€;
showPanel.style.padding = â€œ0â€;
showPanel.style.margin = â€œ0â€;
showPanel.style.overflow = â€œautoâ€;
showPanel.style.marginTop = isIE() ? -1 : â€œ0â€;
panel.appendChild(showPanel);

// å‘½ä»¤è¾“å…¥æ¡†
var cmdArea = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
panel.appendChild(cmdArea);

var cmdTextbox = document.createElement(â€œinputâ€);
cmdTextbox.type = â€œtextâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.height = â€œ12pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.fontSize = â€œ12pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.padding = â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.margin = â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.marginTop = isIE() ? -2 : â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.borderWidth = â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.borderTopWidth = â€œ1pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.paddingTop = â€œ2pxâ€;
cmdArea.appendChild(cmdTextbox);

// çª—å£æ¿€æ´»æˆ–è€…ä¸æ¿€æ´»
var isActive = false;

// æ¿€æ´»çª—å£
var activateWindow = function() {
if (! isVisible) {
return;
}

if (isActive) {
return;
}

cmdTextbox.focus();
title.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#015DF4â€;
isActive = true;
}

panel.onclick = activateWindow;

// ä¸æ¿€æ´»çª—å£
var deactivateWindow = function() {
if (! isVisible) {
return;
}

if (! isActive) {
return;
}

title.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ccccccâ€;
isActive = false;
}

cmdTextbox.onfocus = activateWindow;
cmdTextbox.onblur = deactivateWindow;

// è¾“å‡ºå‡½æ•°
var dbgPrint = function(s) {
showPanel.innerHTML += htmlEncode(s).replace(/\n|(\r\n)/g, â€œ
â€œ);

if (parseInt(showPanel.scrollHeight) > parseInt(showPanel.style.height)) {
showPanel.scrollTop += parseInt(showPanel.scrollHeight) - parseInt(showPanel.style.height);
}
}

// è°ƒç”¨è¾“å…¥å¤„ç†å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
cmdTextbox.onkeydown = function(evt) {
var event = evt || window.event;

if (event.keyCode == 0x0d) {
processInputProc(this.value, dbgPrint);
this.value = â€œâ€;
}
}
}

// åæ ‡ç±»
function Position(x, y) {
this.x = x;
this.y = y;
}

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// å†…è”è°ƒè¯•å™¨ç±»
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
function InlineDebugger() {
var bpList = new Array();
var id_eval;

// è®¾ç½®æ–­ç‚¹
var bp = function(funcName) {
// æ£€æŸ¥evalæ˜¯å¦è¢«hook
if ((new String(eval)).indexOf(â€œ[native code]â€œ) < 0) {
return â€œerror: eval function was hooked by other codes in the front.\nâ€;
}

// ä¿å­˜æœªè¢«hookedçš„eval
id_eval = eval;

var re = /^[a-zA-Z0-9_\.]+$/i;
if (! re.test(funcName)) {
return â€œerror: bad argument of command bp \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ.\nâ€;
}

try {
id_eval(â€œif (typeof(â€œ + funcName + â€œ) == \â€œobject\â€œ || typeof(â€œ + funcName + â€œ) == \â€œfunction\â€œ) {var obj = â€œ + funcName + â€œ;}â€);
} catch (e) {
return â€œerror: â€œ + e + â€œ, invalid function name \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ.\nâ€;
}

if (obj == undefined) {
return â€œerror: the argument of command bp \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ is not a function object.\nâ€;
}

if ((new String(obj)).indexOf(â€œfunctionâ€) < 0) {
return â€œerror: the argument of command bp \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ is a property, a function is required.\nâ€;
}

if (bpList.search(funcName) >= 0) {
return â€œerror: there is a breakpoint on function \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ\nâ€;
}

try {
var sc = â€œwindow.â€ + funcName.replace(/\./g, â€œ_â€œ) + â€œ_bak = â€œ + funcName + â€œ;\nâ€ +
funcName + â€œ = â€œ +
â€œfunction() {\nâ€ +
â€œ var args = \â€œ\â€œ;\nâ€ +
â€œ for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i ++) {\nâ€ +
â€œ args += arguments[i] + (i == (arguments.length - 1) ? \â€œ\â€œ : \â€œ,\â€œ);\nâ€ +
â€œ }\nâ€ +
â€œ if (confirm(\â€œfunction \\\â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\\\â€œ was called, execute it?\\n\\narguments:\\n\â€œ + args + \â€œ\\n\\ncaller:\\n\â€œ + â€œ + funcName + â€œ.caller)) {\nâ€ +
â€œ id_eval(\â€œâ€ + funcName.replace(/\./g, â€œ_â€œ) + â€œ_bak(\\\â€œ\â€œ + jsEncode(args) + \â€œ\\\â€œ)\â€œ);\nâ€ +
â€œ }\nâ€ +
â€œ};â€ +
â€œ\nâ€;
id_eval(sc);
bpList.push(funcName);
return â€œ* breakpoint on function \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ added successfully.\nâ€;
} catch (e) {
return â€œunkown error: â€œ + e + â€œ.\nâ€;
}
}

// æšä¸¾æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ–­ç‚¹
var bl = function() {
if (bpList.length == 0) {
return â€œ* no breakpoint.\nâ€;
}

var bps = â€œ* â€œ + bpList.length + â€œ breakpoints: \nâ€;

for (var i = 0; i < bpList.length; i ++) {
bps += i + â€œ - â€œ + bpList[i] + â€œ\nâ€;
}

return bps;
}

// æ¸…é™¤æŸä¸ªæ–­ç‚¹
var bc = function(n) {
try {
n = parseInt(n);
} catch (e) {
return â€œerror: bc command requires a numeric argument.\nâ€;
}

if (bpList.length == 0) {
return â€œerror: no breakpoint.\nâ€;
}

var funcName = bpList.remove(n);

try {
eval(funcName + â€œ = window.â€ + funcName.replace(/\./g, â€œ_â€œ) + â€œ_bak;â€);
return â€œ* breakpoint on function \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ deleted successfully.\nâ€;
} catch (e) {
return â€œerror: â€œ + e + â€œ.\nâ€;
}
}

// å¸®åŠ©
var help = function() {
var s = â€œdebug commands:\n\nâ€ +
â€œbp - set a breakpoint on a function, e.g. \â€œbp window.alert\â€œ.\nâ€ +
â€œbl - list all breakpoints.\nâ€ +
â€œbc - remove a breakpoint by specified number, e.g. \â€œbc 0\â€œ.\nâ€ +
â€œhelp - help information.\nâ€
â€œ\nâ€;
return s;
}

// å¤„ç†å‘½ä»¤
this.exeCmd = function(cmd) {
cmd = cmd.trim();
var cmdParts = cmd.split(/\s+/g);
var cmdName;
var cmdArg;

if (cmdParts.length == 1) {
cmdName = cmd;
} else {
cmdName = cmdParts[0];
cmdArg = cmdParts[1];
}

switch (cmdName) {
case â€œbpâ€:
if (cmdArg == undefined) {
return â€œerror: bp command requires an argument.\nâ€;
} else {
return bp(cmdArg);
}
break;

case â€œblâ€:
return bl();
break;

case â€œbcâ€:
if (cmdArg == undefined) {
return â€œerror: bc command requires an argument \â€œnumber of breakpoint\â€œ.\nâ€;
} else {
return bc(cmdArg);
}
break;

case â€œhelpâ€:
return help();
break;

default: return â€œerror: command \â€œâ€ + cmdName + â€œ\â€œ not found, you can get information by \â€œhelp\â€œ command.\nâ€;
break;
}
}
}

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// ä¸»è¿‡ç¨‹
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
/*try {
debugger;
} catch (e) {}*/
var id = new InlineDebugger();
var console = new Console(document.body, function(s, printProc){printProc(id.exeCmd(s));});

å½“å‘é€ä¸€ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ä¹Ÿè®¸ä¼šä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹çš„å‡ ä¸ªHEADER

Table 1. Client Cache Headers

Pragma: no-cache

The client is unwilling to accept any cached responses from caches along the route and the origin server must be contacted for a fresh copy of the resource.

If-Modified-Since: datetime

The server should return the requested resource only if the resource has been modified since the date-time provided by the client.

If-None-Match: etagvalue

The server should return the requested resource if the ETAG of the resource is different than the value provided by the client. An ETAG is a unique identifier representing a particular version of a file.

entry.title: é€šè¿‡Performancing for Firefoxå‘å¸ƒBlog - åšå®¢å›­-CarlZeng
entry.content:
Thank you for contacting NetSuite Customer Support regarding creating a custom record type/list similar to the Address tab.
Â 
I found that it is not possible using normal customization. To workaround that, you may just create custom record types (Setup > Customization > Record Types) and display them in the tabs of the record where you want to see them.
Â 
I hope this information is useful to you. If you have further concerns or questions on this, just email back or call into the toll-free number to re-open this case.
Â 
Thank you and have a good day! Â 

Thank you,

Olivia Dy

Thank you for contacting NetSuite Customer Support regarding creating a custom record type/list similar to the Address tab.
Â 
I found that it is not possible using normal customization. To workaround that, you may just create custom record types (Setup > Customization > Record Types) and display them in the tabs of the record where you want to see them.
Â 
I hope this information is useful to you. If you have further concerns or questions on this, just email back or call into the toll-free number to re-open this case.
Â 
Thank you and have a good day! Â 

Thank you,

Olivia Dy
